comment: Great relationships won't stand without sacrifices . It's impossible . How are different people joined together and for years without ever separating ? Your answer is sacrifice , /100 , understanding , and unconditional love .
amr:
# ::snt Great relationships won't stand without sacrifices . It's impossible . How are different people joined together and for years without ever separating ? Your answer is sacrifice , /100 , understanding , and unconditional love .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / stand-03
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (r / relation-03
                  :mod (g / great))
            :manner (s2 / sacrifice-01
                  :polarity -))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (ii / it))
      :snt3 (j / join-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG1-of (d / differ-02))
            :manner (t / together)
            :duration (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))
            :manner (s3 / separate-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 p2
                  :time (e / ever))
            :manner (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt4 (a2 / answer-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (s4 / sacrifice-01
                        :quant (s5 / slash
                              :op1 100
                              :op2 100))
                  :op2 (u / understand-01)
                  :op3 (l / love-01

                              :polarity -)))))

comment: You may have to sacrifice a work day to make sure that time is spent together . You'll have to understand that your spouse is physically and emotionally drained this week , so you'll be picking up where they may lack .
